articles.title: South Africa: Suspected gas leak leaves 16 dead - BBC
articles.description: The leak in a shanty town near Johannesburg is linked to illegal gold mining in the area.
articles.content:
A suspected nitrate oxide gas leak in South Africa has led to the deaths of 16 people, local officials say.
The victims - including women and children - died from gas inhalation at an informal settl… [+1183 chars]
